## Public Member Attributes

### DWARF2LineBase {#afddded28f79b1eccb3a948a4bdd0f6a3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int8&#95;t llvm::MCDwarfLineTableParams::DWARF2LineBase = -5</>}>
Minimum line offset in a special line info.

opcode. The value -5 was chosen to give a reasonable range of values.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcdwarf-h/#l00268">268</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcdwarf-h">MCDwarf.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### DWARF2LineOpcodeBase {#aa098ab41af3f8cee8b1939003d55a776}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::MCDwarfLineTableParams::DWARF2LineOpcodeBase = 13</>}>
First special line opcode - leave room for the standard opcodes.

Note: If you want to change this, you&#39;ll have to update the &quot;StandardOpcodeLengths&quot; table that is emitted in <code>Emit()</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcdwarf-h/#l00265">265</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcdwarf-h">MCDwarf.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
